description: EZW files are used to create official, standards-based real estate documents. The forms may be printed or faxed using easyOFFER. EZW files may also be converted into other types of real estate forms within easyOFFER.

easyOFFER is compliant with the following Ontario real estate form standards: OREA (Ontario Real Estate Association), TREB (Toronto Real Estate Board), and REBBA (Real Estate and Business Brokers Acts).
